owl:Ontology.owl:description: An ontology about vertebrates and some of their features

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isst
mange
می‌خورد
owl:ObjectProperty.owl:description: A relation between animals, which animal preys on and eats which.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: a la température corporelle
hat Körpertemperatur
دمای بدن برابر با
owl:ObjectProperty.owl:description: A relation specifying what the body temperature is.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: a le statue de conservation
hat Erhaltungszustand
دارای وضعیت بقای
owl:ObjectProperty.owl:description: A property specifying what the conservation status of an animal is.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: a un régime
پیرو رژیم غذایی
owl:ObjectProperty.owl:description: A property specifying food habits of animals.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: a le revêtement corporel
hatKörperbedeckung
دارای پوشش بدنی
owl:ObjectProperty.owl:description: A property specifying animals' body coverings.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: a la domicilité
hatZahmheit
واجد خصوصیت رامی
owl:ObjectProperty.owl:description: A relation specifying tameness of animals.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: a le rang taxonomique
hatTaxonomischenRang
دارای رتبه آرایه‌شناختی
owl:ObjectProperty.owl:description: Representing taxonomic ranks of a given creature; i.e. is a class, a phylum, a kingdom etc.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: lebt im Klima
vit dans le climat
ساکن در اقلیم
owl:ObjectProperty.owl:description: A property specifying what kind of climate(s) animals live in.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: aquatischerLebensraumIst
habitatAquatiqueEst
دارای سکونتگاه آبی
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying aquatic habitats of animals.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: aUneLongeurMoyenne
hatdurchschnittlicheLänge
دارای میانگین طول بدن
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying the average length of animals.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: aUneHauteurMoyenne
hatdurchschnittlicheHöhe
دارای میانگین قد
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying average height of animals.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: aUneDuréeDeVieMoyenne
hatEineDurchschnittlicheLebensdauer
دارای میانگین طول عمر
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying average lifespan of animals.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: KlassenameIst
nomDeClasseEst
دارای نام رده
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying the class names of animals.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: estDeCouleur
vonFarbe
دارای رنگ‌[های]
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying color(s) of animals.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: gebräuchlicherNameIst
nomCommunEst
دارای اسم عامیانه
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying the common names of animals.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: englischerGebräuchlicherNameIst
nomCommunAnglaisEst
دارای اسم عامیانه انگلیسی
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying common English names for animals.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: FamilienameIst
nomDeFamilleEst
دارای نام خانواده
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying the Family names of animals.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: gattungnameIst
nomDeGenreEst
دارای نام سرده
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying the genus names of animals.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: habitatEst
lebensraumIst
دارای سکونتگاه
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying the habitat of animals.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: ReichnameIst
nomDeRègneEst
دارای نام فرمانرو
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying the kingdom names of animals.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: nomDeOrdreEst
ordnungnameIst
دارای نام راسته
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying the order names of animals.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: gebräuchlicherFarsiName
nomCommunPersanEst
دارای اسم عامیانه فارسی
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying common Farsi name for animals.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: StammnameIst
nomDeEmbranchementEst
دارای نام شاخه
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying the phylum names of animals.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: artnameIst
nomDeEspèceEst
دارای نام گونه
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying the species names of animals.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: nomTaxonomiqueEst
taxonomischernameIst
دارای نام آرایه‌شناختی
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying the taxonomic names of animals.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: habitatTerrestreEst
terrestrischerLebensraumIst
دارای سکونتگاه زمینی
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying terrestrial habitats of animals.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: aLaVitesseMaximale
hatHöchstgeschwindigkeit
دارای حداکثر سرعت
owl:DatatypeProperty.owl:description: A data property specifying the top speed of animals.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Amphibie
amphibie
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing different kinds of amphibians

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Animal
Animal
Tier
حیوان
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing all living things categorized under the kingdom Animalia.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Vogel
oiseau
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing different kinds of birds

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Körpertemperatur
température corporelle
دمای بدن
owl:Class.owl:description: This is a class representing body temperature of animals. It has two individuals: changing and constant. Constant body temperature includes to warm blooded creatures and changing body temperature indludes cold blooded ones.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Klima
climat
اقلیم
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing different types of climates animals could live in. Class Climate includes four instances: Arctic, Tropical, Moderate, Cold.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: وضعیت بقا
owl:Class.rdfs:seeAlso: Representing the conservation status of animals.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DomainThing
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing our main concept of interest and class hierarchy: Animals, or to be more specific vertebrates.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ausgestorben
disparu
منقرض‌شده
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing the conservation status(es) considered as disappeared. It has two instances: One representing extinct as in extinct in the wild and the other, as in completely extinct.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fisch
poisson
owl:Class.owl:description: Representating different kinds of fishes

owl:Class.rdfs:label: abondant
reichlich
فراوان
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing the coservation status(es) considered as safe, i.e. plenty of animals exist if the conservation status of an animal is of type lower risk. It includes only one instance: LeastConcern.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Säugetier
mammifère
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing different kinds of mammals

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Beuteltier
marsupial
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing one of the three main groups of living mammals; whose distinctive characteristic is that most of the young are carried in a pouch. Well-known marsupials include kangaroos, wallabies, koalas, possums, opossums, wombats, and Tasmanian devils.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Kloakentiere
Monotremata
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing one of the three main groups of living mammals; typified by structural differences in their brains, jaws, digestive tract, reproductive tract, and other body parts compared to the more common mammalian types. In addition they lay eggs rather than bear live young, but like all mammals, the female monotremes nurse their young with milk.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: non-vertébré
غیرمهره‌دار
owl:Class.owl:description: We represent any animal who is not categorized as vertebrate with this class.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Höhere Säugetiere
Placentalia
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing one of the three main groups of living mammals; whose distinctive feature compared to the other two categories lies in the fact that the fetus is carried in the uterus of its mother to a relatively late stage of development.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Reptil
reptile
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing different reptiles

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Atmungssystem
système respiratoire
دستگاه تنفسی
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing respiratory system of animals.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Körperbedeckung
revêtement corporel
پوشش بدن
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing sking covering of animals.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Zahmheit
docilité
رامی
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing animals' status of tameness.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: rang taxonomique
taxonomischer Rang
رتبه آرایه‌شناختی
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing taxonomic rank of animals.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: geschützt
protégé
محافظت‌شده
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing the conservation status(es) considered as guarded and Threatened. It includes three instances: CriticallyEndangered, Endangered, NearEndangered.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: inconnu
unbekannte
نامعلوم
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing conservation status of the so-called animal has not yet been examined. This is either due to lack of data, or simply because it has never been evaluated before.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ValueThing
owl:Class.owl:description: Representing classes which describe information about our main concept of interest; aka animals and specifically vertebrates.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Wirbeltier
vertébré
مهره‌دار
owl:Class.owl:description: Vertebrates comprise all species of animals within the subphylum Vertebrata (i.e. chordates with backbones). Vertebrates represent the overwhelming majority of the phylum Chordata, with currently about 69,276 species described.
